2012.context: Amplitude, Inc. is a digital analytics platform company focused on product analytics, experimentation, and customer data platform. Founded to help companies understand user behavior in digital products.

competitors.name: Google Analytics
competitors.notes: Comprehensive analytics tool for website and app performance, audience segmentation, conversion tracking

competitors.name: Mixpanel
competitors.notes: Founded 2009, product analytics with event tracking, user segmentation, and A/B testing - most direct competitor

competitors.name: Adobe Analytics (Omniture)
competitors.notes: Originally launched as Omniture in 1996, acquired by Adobe in 2009, feature-heavy enterprise solution

competitors.name: Kissmetrics
competitors.notes: Analytics platform focusing on user behavior tracking

2020.context: Amplitude, Inc. is a digital analytics platform company focused on product analytics, experimentation, and customer data platform. Product analytics demand grew as companies focused on digital customer experience.

competitors.name: Mixpanel
competitors.notes: Founded 2009, most direct competitor with similar product analytics focus, priced around $12,000/year for entry plan

competitors.name: Heap Analytics
competitors.notes: Automatic user interaction capture on web and mobile apps with retroactive event tracking

competitors.name: Google Analytics
competitors.notes: Comprehensive free analytics tool for website and app performance

competitors.name: Adobe Analytics
competitors.notes: Enterprise solution with advanced segmentation, real-time data, and predictive analytics

competitors.name: PostHog
competitors.notes: Founded 2020, open-source platform combining product analytics, session replay, feature flags, A/B testing

competitors.name: Hotjar
competitors.notes: Session replay and behavior analytics platform

competitors.name: Kissmetrics
competitors.notes: Customer engagement and analytics platform

competitors.name: Looker
competitors.notes: Business intelligence and analytics platform

competitors.name: Microsoft Power BI
competitors.notes: Business analytics and visualization platform

competitors.name: Tableau
competitors.notes: Data visualization and business intelligence platform

competitors.name: Smartlook
competitors.notes: Session replay and mobile analytics

competitors.name: Fullstory
competitors.notes: Behavioral data and session replay platform

2024.context: Amplitude, Inc. is a digital analytics platform company focused on product analytics, experimentation, and customer data platform. Competing with Mixpanel, Google Analytics, and enterprise analytics platforms.

competitors.name: Mixpanel
competitors.notes: Original product analytics platform, 6,300 of top 1M sites use it (vs Amplitude's 10,678 as of Jan 2024)

competitors.name: Pendo
competitors.notes: 3,711 of top 1M sites, focuses on in-app guides, feedback, product tools, includes session replay

competitors.name: Heap
competitors.notes: Autocaptures all user activity data without manual tracking setup

competitors.name: Google Analytics
competitors.notes: Free comprehensive analytics platform, top alternative for website and app tracking

competitors.name: Adobe Analytics
competitors.notes: Enterprise feature-heavy solution, no free version, complex pricing

competitors.name: PostHog
competitors.notes: Open-source platform combining product analytics, session replay, feature flags, A/B testing, user surveys

competitors.name: Fullstory
competitors.notes: Behavioral data platform with patented technology for quality behavioral data at scale

competitors.name: Glassbox
competitors.notes: Mobile-focused analytics with session replay, 386 of top 1M websites as of Jan 2024

competitors.name: LogRocket
competitors.notes: Includes performance monitoring and error tracking (which Amplitude lacks)

competitors.name: Contentsquare
competitors.notes: Exceptional user analytics functionality, unique capabilities for feature release analytics

competitors.name: Kubit
competitors.notes: Warehouse-native architecture, lower TCO, data security focus

competitors.name: Optimizely Warehouse-Native Analytics
competitors.notes: Warehouse-native tool that directly queries cloud warehouses

2025.context: Amplitude, Inc. is a digital analytics platform company focused on product analytics, experimentation, and customer data platform. AI-powered insights and expanded CDP (customer data platform) capabilities.

competitors.name: Pendo
competitors.notes: Best overall Amplitude alternative. Digital experience optimization platform for product analytics of web and mobile apps. User sentiment rating: not specified.

competitors.name: Mixpanel
competitors.notes: Second-ranked alternative. Digital analytics platform with impressive data visualization. Self-serve product analytics helping teams analyze how and why people engage, convert, retain in real-time across devices. Serves 26,000+ companies including Expedia, Uber, Ancestry, DocuSign, Lemonade.

competitors.name: Heap
competitors.notes: Third-ranked alternative. Digital analytics platform with tools for digital experiences, user journeys, conversions, feedback, retention. User sentiment rating: 87 based on 1,528 reviews.

competitors.name: FullStory
competitors.notes: Digital experience intelligence platform. Three parts: data capture, product analytics, session insights. Provides well-rounded view of current digital experience.

competitors.name: Contentsquare
competitors.notes: Combines product analytics, session replay, journey analysis, voice of customer in one platform. Built-in AI and business impact analysis.

competitors.name: Smartlook
competitors.notes: Product analytics and session recording platform similar to Amplitude.

competitors.name: Hotjar
competitors.notes: User behavior analytics platform known for heatmaps and session recording functionality.

competitors.name: Google Analytics
competitors.notes: Freemium website analytics software offering robust customer analytics capabilities.

competitors.name: Adobe Analytics
competitors.notes: Creates holistic business view by turning customer interactions into actionable insights. Intuitive interactive dashboards and reports for real-time information.

competitors.name: Quantum Metric
competitors.notes: Digital analytics platform. User sentiment rating: 94 based on 6 reviews (highest rated).

competitors.name: Userpilot
competitors.notes: Product analytics with user engagement capabilities. User sentiment rating: 92 based on 893 reviews.

competitors.name: UXCam
competitors.notes: Mobile app analytics platform. User sentiment rating: 93 based on 256 reviews.

competitors.name: Glassbox
competitors.notes: Digital experience analytics platform for large enterprises in retail and B2C. Wide feature range but can be overwhelming for teams.
